page.description: Return the first element of the collection.
page.original:
&ltCOLLECTION>.FIRST() Syntax Key as C = &ltCOLLECTION>.FIRST() Key as D = &ltCOLLECTION>.FIRST() Key as N = &ltCOLLECTION>.FIRST() Description The &ltCOLLECTION>.FIRST() method returns the first Key in a collection. Example dim mycollection as u mycollection.SET("FJ","Fred Jones") mycollection.SET("BB","Bryan Boyd") mycollection.SET("KL","Kim Lee") mycollection.SET("KB","Karen Boyd") mycollection.SET("EL","Erica Loyd") ? mycollection.FIRST() = "FJ"
See Also Collection Methods
